channel.title: S3 on IMTI
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on IMTI

item.title: AI Data Lake Access with MCP and S3
item.description: Data warehouses handle structured queries. Data lakes handle everything else: documents, images, logs, backups, ML model weights, that CSV someone exported three years ago and never deleted. The S3 API has become the universal interface for object storage. AWS built it, and now MinIO, SeaweedFS, Ceph, and dozens of others implement it. [txn2/mcp-s3] brings this storage layer to AI assistants through MCP, working alongside txn2/mcp-trino.
